title: Quality Covid Advice Plus How Medicine Can Undermine the Biological Level
description:
It's hard to tell what's good Quality advice, or sometimes what is even "factual". Maybe we need to start honestly listening to our instincts a little more. 

Video referenced:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vN30emwcNS4
